OpenCore

OpenCore is a Microkernel, Pure Plugin-based and Service Oriented enterprise application platform based on OSGi and REST technologies for building open, integrated seamlessly and collaborative software application.

请参见：
          描述

软件包
org.opengoss.core Core plugin of OpenCore SOA Platform to support Ioc and ExtensionPoint based on OSGi.
org.opengoss.core.internal Internal implementation package that will not be exported.
org.opengoss.core.internal.descriptor Implementations of service and extension points registry.
org.opengoss.core.internal.registry XML parser that parse "META-MF/plugin.xml" and build the element descriptors.
org.opengoss.core.util Utility Classes.

 

OpenCore is a Microkernel, Pure Plugin-based and Service Oriented enterprise application platform based on OSGi and REST technologies for building open, integrated seamlessly and collaborative software application.

OpenCore built on Java, OSGi and Equinox is an open source project that is distilled from opengoss(www.opengoss.org)-the open source NGOSS product.

 概述  软件包  类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助
